title: Nova Scotia caught off guard by New Brunswick border reopening
content:

author: Emma Teitel - City Columnist
description: Doctors are racking their brains for analogies to convince people that mixing vaccines is safe. This has got to stop, says Emma Teitel. The important part is to get two doses without delay. Mix and match Pfizer and Moderna if that’s what’s available to you.
title: Emma Teitel: So you got Pfizer first and Moderna second? That’s OK, experts say: your body doesn’t recognize brand names
content: Has anything been analogized more than the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines? At a news conference Wednesday morning, the city’s top doctor, Eileen de Villa, reassured Torontonians that both mRNA vaccines … [+4953 chars]

author: Adam Miller
description: Canada is poised to battle back more contagious coronavirus variants that threaten to jeopardize reopening plans across the country due to a huge uptick in vaccine supply, a willingness from Canadians to get the shots and some promising new vaccine research.
title: How Canada can crush the variants with vaccines and make this reopening our last
